name: notes_generator
description: Generate concise and structured notes from various inputs using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) approach.

input_type.description: The type of input provided. Can be 'text', 'file', or 'url'.

input_content.description: The content to be processed as a string (only required if input_type is 'text').

file_path.description: The path to the file to be processed (only required if input_type is 'file').

focus_topic.description: The specific topic or focus area for note generation. Used to guide the RAG approach.

output_structure.description: The desired format of the generated notes: 'bullet', 'paragraph', or 'table'.

export_format.description: The export format for the generated notes. Currently, only 'json' is supported.

output.description: The tool returns a JSON object containing the 'notes' field with the generated summary.
